colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @035B (DE'I NANG NA CHOS SKYONG 'KHOR BCAS BZHUGS PAR BSAM ZHING, SLOB MA ME TOG 'THOR DU BCUG LA, GTOR MA MGO THOG TU BZHAG TE, BKRA SHIS KYI TSIG MANG DU BRJOD, ,CHOS SKYONG SKU GSUNG THUGS KYI DNGOS GRUB GSOL BAR BSAM MO, ,RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS MCHOD PA'I CHO GA RIN PO CHE'I GTER ZHES BYA BA 'DI, RGYUD RDO RJES SA 'OG DANG SLOB DPON 'GRO BZANG SNYING POS MDZAD PA'I PHYAG RDOR GYI BSGRUB THABS DANG, GTOR CHOG DANG, DES MDZAD PA'I CHOS SKYONG GI ZHI BA NOR BSGRUB PA DANG, DRAG PO MTHU BSGRUB PA GNYIS DANG, KHA CHE @036A *, ,DGON PA PAS MDZAD PA'I GSANG BSGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS DANG, PAndI TA SHRI BHA DRAS MDZAD PA'I RNAM SRAS RTA SNGON CAN SGRUB THABS DANG, GSANG BA GSHIN RJE LTAR SGRUB PA LA GSHIN RJE KHRAM THOGS NAG PO'I RGYUD DANG, SLOB DPON DGA' RAB RDO RJES MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS DANG, YANG GSANG MDUNG DMAR CAN LA SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS DANG, GZHAN YANG ZANGS DKAR 'PHAGS PA SHES RAB DANG, MKHAN CHEN LHO BRAG PA DANG, CHOS RJE BU STON YAB SRAS DANG, BLA MA RGYA STON LA SOGS MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO RNAMS KYI GSUNG TSAD MAR BYAS TE, DON DU GNYER BA'I SLOB MAS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, CHU STOD ZLA BA'I YAR NGO'I TSES GSUM LA, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG JO GDAN GNYAG PHU BA BSOD NAMS BZANG POS SBYAR 'DIS BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN LA PHAN PA DPAG TU MED PA 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
